response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled quality and potential impact, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique advantage while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget, allowing us to proceed with confidence. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of creating a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
